text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://spor.ema.europa.eu/v1/lists/100000110633
  • Include all codes defined in http://spor.ema.europa.eu/v1/lists/200000000014

name: AllUnits
title: All Units Combined
description: Value set for presentation strength denominator unit, combines units of measurement and units of presentation.
